Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அற்றால் அறவறிந்து உண்க அஃதுடம்பு பெற்றான் நெடிதுய்க்கும் ஆறு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: If (one's food has been) digested let one eat with moderation; (for) that is the way to prolong the life of an embodied soul.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person has confirmed their previous meal is digested ('அற்றால்'). They are now eating their next meal.
Layered_Composition.Midground: They are eating with great moderation, knowing the right amount for their body ('அறவறிந்து உண்க'). This is visualized by them eating from a plate that has a 'fill line' which they do not exceed.
Layered_Composition.Background: Because of this practice of moderate eating, the thread of their life is shown to be long and strong, stretching far into the distance. This is the way to a long life ('நெடிதுய்க்கும் ஆறு').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Once your food is digested, eat again, but with moderation. This is the way to make your body last for a long time.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The 'fill line' on the plate is a clear visual for moderation. The long, strong thread of life is the symbol for longevity.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, healthy, and balanced light. The colors are natural and wholesome.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that shows the person eating moderately, with the long thread of life stretching out from them.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a clean and clear aesthetic.

Cultural_Anchors: The way to a long life ('நெடிதுய்க்கும் ஆறு')
The virtue of temperance in eating.
